title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
bid_submission_type: Submit a copy of the addendum with the proposal.
term_of_bid: Quantities will be spread over life of the contract.
installation: White glove services required, including asset decaling, asset reporting, etching, and delivery to varied locations. Etching is only required on laptops. Desktops do not need to be secured.
additional_documentation_required: Additional warranty information and pricing can be submitted as an attachment. Form 1295 should be submitted with the RFP response.
bid_summary: This addendum provides responses to vendor questions regarding the RFP for student and staff computing devices. It clarifies specifications, warranty requirements, deployment details, and submission instructions.
product_specification: USB 3.1 is a minimum requirement for display monitors. A higher specification is permissible. One-year warranty for student Chromebooks and three years for student and staff Windows laptops are required. Windows devices require autopilot. Chromebooks require enrollment in Google Management. 65w chargers are a minimum requirement for Chrome devices.
